page.title: 11TRANSPORT ASHBY M PEATLING P
page.content: As Ashby Magna and Peatling Parva have no public transport provided regularly most people travel by private means. There are, however, two school buses every weekday morning and afternoon but the general public cannot use them. There is a private bus to Leicester which goes through several surrounding villages including Ashby Magna and Peatling Parva on Wednesday mornings, returning early afternoon. A similar service is run on Thursday mornings taking passengers to the market town of Lutterworth, returning midday. Although there is no public transport in rural villages the community spirit is such that one neighbour with transport will always help a neighbour without.
